name: The Poker Player
description:
Adds a character called The Poker Player, who fights with his own rule inspired from poker.

- Adds 84 cards and 12 relics.
- Contains a Poker Player exclusive event, which can be enabled for other characters in the config.

v0.7.1 (2019-04-15)
- Fixed crash issue when you play Risky Bet with 1 or less other cards in hand.
- Changed some wording.
- Card Printer cost reduced 3 -> 2.

0.7.2 (2019-04-16)
- Add ZHS support.
